definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: a kind of weed, perh. chickpea (cicercula), v. Löw:p. 153 (Syr. h.uwrlo0 fodder for horses; Targum Pr 24:31 gives [[חוּרְלָא]])—abs. ´[[ח]] Job 30:6, Zep 2:9; pl. [[חֲרֻלִים]] Pr 24:31; —as growing in devastated land, coll. Zep 2:9; in vineyard of slothful, pl. ´[[כִּסּוּ פניו ח]] Pr 24:31 (‖[[קִמְּשׂגִים]]); as sole shelter of certain outcast peoples Job 30:7 ([[שִׂיחִים]]).
